forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then becoming windy with a steady rain for the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then becoming windy with a steady rain for the afternoon. High 48F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening rain. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early. Decreasing clouds overnight. Low around 35F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 46F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
